messages.title: UPGRADING OUR INFRASTRUCTURE
messages.content: I helped make sure that Salisbury was the first full fibre broadband city in the UK. Now we need to focus on improvements to the A36 and enhance the appeal of the city centre and The Maltings.

messages.title: IMPROVING THE ENVIRONMENT
messages.content: The natural environment is our greatest treasure. I am committed to greening the city centre in Salisbury and protecting the rural character of villages across South Wiltshire.

messages.title: HIGH-QUALITY LOCAL JOBS
messages.content: I want to see us harness the science and technology hubs at Porton and Boscombe Down to create high-value jobs for local people. I am passionate about creating a strong local economy with fantastic employment opportunities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focus on improvements to the A36, enhance the city centre and The Maltings, and build on Salisbury's status as the first full fibre broadband city in the UK.
Greening the city centre and protecting the rural character of villages in South Wiltshire.
Leverage science and technology hubs at Porton and Boscombe Down to create high-value jobs and boost local economy.

issues.environment: Committed to greening the city centre and protecting rural character of villages.

images.caption: John Glen with a group of people.
